participant_1.background:
I would love to have lunch with my sponsor, who has helped me so much on my journey of recovery.
I feel like I'm not living up to my full potential.
i like to create websites.
I do my best to support my family and be there for them.
my major was american literature and education.

participant_2.background:
My wife and I went fishing for the first time since getting married.
My favorite type of fruit is watermelon, it is sweet and refreshing, and it reminds me of summer.
My parents are both very supportive of my dream to be a veterinarian.
I remember the feeling of freedom when I ran through the woods behind my house as a child.
i enjoy organizing my surroundings.

content.text: Hey there! What is your favorite fruit?
My favorite fruit is watermelon, it is sweet and refreshing, and it reminds me of summer!
That sounds delicious! I love watermelon too.
What is something you like to do in your free time?
I like to create websites, I find it really enjoyable.
That sounds really interesting! I have always wanted to learn how to do that.
You should give it a try! It is not too difficult to learn.
My major is animal science, I want to be a veterinarian when I graduate.
That sounds like a great goal! I am sure you will achieve it.
Thank you! I am really excited about it.
What are some of your favorite things about being a child?
I loved the freedom I had when I was a child, I could run around and play all day long without a care in the world.
I miss that too! I feel like adults have so much responsibility.
Me too! But I also like the sense of accomplishment I get when I complete a task.
That is true! I think it is important to find a balance between work and play.
I agree! I am trying to find that balance right now.
